name: Rainy Day (Mat, Audrey_LH)
description:
A Rainy Day is a game where you have to keep your torch on. 

Brave the weather to survive the winter, and bring warmth in your burrow.

We’re a team of three students, and we’re glad to participate. We look forward for you to play our game 😉 !

Artist :

  • Audrey Lhomme

Developers :

  • Mathis Abdou
  • Alex Doumenq
